programs.name: Master in Language Analysis and Processing (HAP/LAP)
programs.source_title: Master in Language Analysis and Processing - UPV/EHU
programs.notes: Official 2026 dates not yet published. Based on the previous year, Phase 1 is expected to run from approx. March 3 to March 26, 2026. This program is taught entirely in English.

programs.name: Erasmus Mundus Master in Language and Communication Technologies (LCT)
programs.source_title: Erasmus Mundus Master in Language and Communication Technologies (LCT) - UPV/EHU
programs.notes: As an Erasmus Mundus program, the scholarship deadline is typically in January/February 2026 via the LCT consortium website. Local admission via UPV/EHU follows the standard university calendar (March/May/July).

programs.name: Master in Computational Engineering and Intelligent Systems
programs.source_title: Máster Universitario en Ingeniería Computacional y Sistemas Inteligentes
programs.notes: Official 2026 dates not yet published. Expected Phase 1: March 2026. Expected Phase 2: May 2026. Taught primarily in Spanish, with some support/materials in English.

programs.name: Master in Computer Engineering (Ingeniería Informática)
programs.notes: Official 2026 dates not yet published. Expected Phase 1: March 2026. This degree qualifies for the regulated profession of Computer Engineer in Spain.
